p: The methods used for stereochemical identification are based on previously described analyses, such as Son et al [ 47] and Attia, Kim and Ro [ 48]. These studies reported identification of (-)-α-bisabolol and (+)-epi-α-bisabolol by the chromatographic analyses in non-chiral column (such as DB1-MS column), and subsequent chiral column analysis (α-cyclodextrin chiral) by comparing standards of molecules with known stereochemistry.
